duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyzing client data for translation into the format needed for tax software implementation.
Assisting the Implementation Manager with day to day support for clients.
Investigating new software features using feedback gathered during the implementation processes.
Interacting with newly contracted customers to gain understanding of their data files, then formatting as needed for software implementation.
Identifying implementation challenges and providing recommendations for solutions.
Gathering customer feedback to identify and document gaps in software functionality.
Working closely with the Implementation Manager to resolve gaps in software functionality.
Assisting with documentation needed for clients on implementation processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Taxation, Finance, or a related field (Master's preferred)
